column4: I have accidentally rm -rf the contents of my home directory, is there anything I can do
photorec is a recovery program included with testdisk, which is the package the bot pointed you to
i've never actually used it to be honest, i just know it's the only recovery tool available from the repositories
well, it tries to recover *files* from lost partitions. if the partition is not actually lost, i don't think it make a difference to it
still, best you'll be able to do is recover single files here and there, nothing will just give you back your virgin /home directory as it was
